title: "expand all folders" only applied to visible folders when filtering
author: farosch
body_snippet:
When filtering is enabled in settings only currently visible folders in the connection tree are being expanded when clicking on the "expand all folders" icon.

## Expected Behavior
All folders are being expanded, whether they are minimized or not.

## Current Behavior
Only currently visible folders get expanded.

## Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)
1. Create new config file
2. Create new connection folder
3. Place connection inside the folder
4. Minimize folder
5. Fiter for connection...
